scripts.clean: rimraf build generated unmemoized js_output abc lib app/user/build
scripts.compile:ets: npm run compile:plugin && cd src/ets && ets-tsc -p ./etsconfig.json
scripts.unmemoize:all: npm run unmemoize:runtime && npm run unmemoize:arkui-no-common && npm run unmemoize:arkui-common && npm run unmemoize
scripts.build:user: npm run unmemoize:all && npm run build:user:inc
scripts.build:user:pure-sts: npm run build:arkui:pure-sts --prefix ../../arkui && ../../../incremental/tools/panda/arkts/arktsc-capi --file src/sts/hello.sts  --arktsconfig arktsconfig-pure-sts.json --output build/sts/abc/hello.abc --dump-plugin-ast --restart-stages --decl-arktsconfig arktsconfig-dsts.json
scripts.pack: npm run cli-tools:download && cd app && DEVECO_SDK_HOME=../../../../arkoala/ohos-sdk/ohos-sdk ../../../command-line-tools/hvigor/bin/hvigorw --no-daemon --mode module -p product=default -p module=user@default assembleHar
scripts.har-arm32: npm run build:user && npm run --prefix ../../../arkoala/ohos-sdk download && node scripts/build-har.mjs --name user --arch arm32 && npm run pack
scripts.har-arm64: npm run build:user && npm run --prefix ../../../arkoala/ohos-sdk download && node scripts/build-har.mjs --name user --arch arm64 && npm run pack
scripts.har-universal: npm run build:user && npm run --prefix ../../../arkoala/ohos-sdk download && node scripts/build-har-universal.mjs --name user && npm run pack
